name: Tonight we score high
description:
Can you use your cunning and agility to score the highest prize? Challange yourself in this stealth game, run past vision areas if you are low on time but beware losing your stealth bar. 

I'm using interpretation of word "score" as verb "to succeed in an activity or to achieve something". I've almost made a game about drug addict named Score which could make a title "The high Score" :>

This was my first attempt at creating music by myself.

Made for One Minute Game Jam #6
